  • A bonus DVD containing approximately 40 minutes of media footage. Footage includes 5 television interviews, 3 radio interviews, and a media slide show that includes approximately 40 clippings of media coverage. The game's ROM file is also on the disc so players can also play the game through an emulator.
title: Extra Terrestrials (Special Edition)

description: Flappy is an homebrew version of Flappy Bird for Atari 2600. The player plays as Bird. By flying through the pipes the player gets points. If the bird falls or touches something, the game is over.
title: Flappy

description: Princess Rescue is a homebrew game for the Atari 2600 in 32K. It is essentially a re-imagining of the game Super Mario Bros as it could have looked on the Atari 2600 with what at the time would have been a very expensive cartridge. There are a full 16 levels and it plays very similar to the original Super Mario Bros on NES.
title: Princess Rescue

description:
Epic Adventure is a spiritual successor to the original Adventure for the Atari 2600, with similar gameplay but with upgraded graphics.

You need to recapture the Golden Chalice and return it to your castle . The Chalice is now protected by orcs, a cave troll, a dragon, a hawk that steals your stuff, and potentially the evil magician.

The Chalice is hidden in one of three places. You can find many items to help you, including a sword, a skeleton key, a staff, and an amulet that makes you invisible to enemies.

The game has three skill levels:

Level 1: Items are in fixed locations close to your castle. Two hits to kill the Dragon, one hit to kill the Troll. No Evil Magician. Level 2: Items are in fixed locations throughout the Kingdom. Three hits to kill the Dragon, two hits to kill the Troll. Evil Magician present. Level 3: Items are in randomized locations. Three hits to kill the Dragon, two hits to kill the Troll. Evil Magician present.
title: Epic Adventure

description:
Dragon's Descent is a roguelike action RPG. You play as a young dragon who needs to explore a labyrinth with thousands of possible levels. The maze is filled with treasure but also contains danger.

The player must navigate the maze, search for keys to the next level, avoid monsters, and find treasure rooms that can give them a choice of potential powers.

Depending on the game settings, the maze will end on the 7th level, or indefinitely continue. Each level of the maze is made up of several rooms.

To make progress in the maze, the player must find the key on each level and then the level's exit, while avoiding touching walls, enemies, or enemy projectiles.

In addition to a key and exit, each level of the Labyrinth has a treasure room, which allows the player to pick one of three power ups: Gem (worth 500 points), Heart (increases total hit points), and Lamp (increases fire breath power).
title: Dragon's Descent

description: Cubis is a homebrew game of popular puzzle game Tetris. Geometric shapes fall from the top of a playfield to rest on the bottom; fit the pieces together, and the line they form disappears. If the pieces don't form lines and eventually stack up to the top of the playfield, the game is over.
title: Cubis

description:
Bomb on Pixel City is a 2D arcade bombing game with gameplay similar to City Comber and Canyon Bomber. This Atari 2600 version was inspired by the 2011 iOS game Bomb on Pixel City, which was a tribute to the Atari 2600 system, by the same development group and is described as a remake.

The game consists of ten levels that are each fixed, single screen environments. The player controls a plane bomber near the top of the screen and needs to destroy buildings below by dropping bombs on them. Each successful hit is rewarded with points. Successive hits are rewarded through combos.

The plane only moves in one direction, but the player can determine the speed by moving left or right. When the plane disappear on one side of the screen it wraps around and appears on the other side, but slightly slower, so the pressure increases to flatten the buildings before the plane hits one of them.

The player needs to watch out for birds that suddenly appear and steam launched upwards from pipes. There are also trees that can optionally be bombed and hospitals that need to be avoided. The game is available in NTSC, PAL and SECAM as separate versions.
title: Bomb on Pixel City

description:
Birthday Mania is a simple overhead shooter. Waves of candles come down from the top of the screen. Using the dial on a paddle controller, players move their character left and right and use the fire button to shoot them. Each wave features a set number of candles, and there are pauses between waves.

Birthday Mania's gimmick was its customizability. Players could order the game as a gift for another person; the developer would customize the title screen with the recipient's name and manufacture a custom copy for them. The manual and label also featured room for the recipient's name to be handwritten.
title: Birthday Mania

description: A homebrew version of the game Lady Bug.

sample_screenshots.caption: The lady bug died - the wings and halo float away.

title: Lady Bug

description: Nuts is a fixed-screen shooter. You play as a squirrel protecting your stash of nuts from a pack of weasels, by throwing rocks up at them as they run left to right and right to left above you. The weasels will throw rocks back at the squirrel and if the squirrel is hit, the player will lose a life. If the weasels are able to make ten full loops of going back and forth the player will also lose a life, so the player must try to defeat the weasels as fast as possible.

sample_screenshots.caption: At first everything happens at a leisurely pace.
Getting busier and quicker as you go on playing.

title: Nuts

description: Ninijish Guy in Low Res World is the story of a ninja who has been trapped in a mysterious complex. In order to escape, you must use your ninja skills to navigate a series of rooms containing various fiendish death traps. You can run, jump, climb, and slide, and defeat enemies by jumping on their heads. The game is essentially a platformer where each room is a puzzle that requires thought as well as dexterity in order to survive.
title: Ninjish Guy in Low Res World

description: Carrot Kingdom is a 2D platformer where the player controls Jinny, an anthropomorphic cat girl maid, as she travels through the Carrot Kingdom in order to free it from the tyrannical reign of the evil Carrot King. There are three boss battles and intermission screens that advance the story.
title: Carrot Kingdom

description: A Roach in Space is a top down space shooter similar to Space Invaders or Galaga. The premise is that you are a roach who was sent to space as part of an experiment. Your ship was trapped in a cosmic ray storm and exploded. You lost two of your legs but survived, and gained the ability to fly in space and shoot energy blasts from your antennae. Your mission is to return to Earth, avoiding the aliens who are trying to kill you. The game features a life bar, power-ups, and many different types of enemies, including 4 mid-bosses and one final boss.
title: A Roach in Space

description:
Deepstone Catacomb is a dungeon exploration game. The evil Dark Lord Kram, along with his army of Undead Soldiers and three ferocious Dragons, has kidnapped Princess Robyn and caged her twenty-six floors down into the very dark underworld of the Catacomb. You must rescue the Princess and defeat the Dark Lord.

In each level, your goal is to explore the entire floor, clear the many rooms and corridors of enemies, collect the items left behind, and find the ladder down to the next level. You cannot go back up once you have gone down.

You must defeat the three Dragons and the Dark Lord before you will be able to rescue Princess Robyn.
title: Deepstone Catacomb

description: My Golf recreates the sport for one or two players with handicapping supported. The action takes place over a full eighteen hole course of bunkers, trees and water hazards. The player must select their direction and distance adjusting for wind, before executing the shot using three timed button presses, being careful to avoid hook and slice where not desired. The golfer's swing is animated, with the par score and total strokes displayed on screen. Putting is viewed from a separate single-screen perspective.
title: My Golf

description: Game of the Bear is a platformer. The player controls Ursulo the bear who is kidnapped for no apparent reason by Wizardo the wizard and needs to escape. Ursulo can collect keys to open doors, but can only carry one key at a time and has no other inventory. The player needs to avoid monsters and other hazards, reach the wizard's inner lair, and defeat him.
title: Game of the Bear

description: In Escape from the Castle the player controls either as Cat or Leo, both of whom have been captured in the titular castle. Your character must escape the castle before it's too late, and on the way out defeat the evil Melee-Bat. There are other enemies to avoid or defeat, and objects to use (including an inventory).
title: Escape from the Castle

description: In Unholy, the player is Gabriel Sancti, a young monk who needs to enter a haunted mansion to save the lovely Isabella Lorraine. The gameplay is similar to exploring a dungeon in the original The Legend of Zelda; the player needs to defeat enemies, find keys to open doors, and solve some basic puzzles.
title: Unholy

description:
Rad Action Pak is a compilation pack that was released in Australia for the Atari 2600. It features four games by Activision:

  • Kung-Fu Master
  • Chopper Command
  • Frostbite
  • Freeway

Chopper Command is included on its own cartridge, while Kung-Fu Master, Frostbite, and Freeway are combined on the second cartridge.
title: Rad Action Pak

description: Ébivision's version of Pac-Man is an unofficial port of the arcade classic that is much closer to the original than the officially released version. Never offered for sale, the game was only available as a contest prize, being awarded to the first person to find the hidden room in Alfred Challenge. It was later developed into the Pac-Man variant Pesco.

sample_screenshots.caption: I ate a power dot and now I can eat the blue ghosts.
Pac-Man starts moving from the start.
There is a cherry just below the ghost home.

title: Pac-Man

description: Atrix is a remake of the Atari 2600 game Ixion, a game that was to be published by SEGA in 1984, but was never officially released. This fast-paced game is set in a single environment where the character controlled by the player can only move over tiles to get around. Enemies appear and need to be taken out.
title: Atrix
Masters of the Universe: The Power of He-Man

description: In Asteroid Fire, the player controls a spaceship in the center of the screen that can fire a projectile in four directions. The player uses a radar at the bottom of the screen to navigate and to see enemy ships and other obstacles, some of which fire upon the player. After blowing up enough of these targets, the enemy flagship will appear and the next level will begin.
title: Asteroid Fire

description: Your aim is to survive as long as you can by negotiating through upcoming platforms on your way down. In the course of the game, bonus items appear for you to pick up, such as fruit for additional points, a skateboard that allows you to move faster, or a miniature helicopter that will enhance your gliding skills. The scrolling platforms can squeeze you to the top of the screen - or you can miss all current platforms and fall to the empty void, either event means an instant game over. The game is notable for its realistic physics and fluid animation of the protagonist. Inertia is a major challenge, thus you have to adjust your technique to land where you actually want.

sample_screenshots.caption: With the skateboard you can move significantly faster.
Fruit can be picked up for points.
There are four different varieties of fruit, and on the bottom right there's an indicator showing which ones you already have. When you collect all four, a more valuable bonus item will show up.
Another bonus thingy, I haven't figured out what it's for.

title: Man Goes Down

description:
Anguna 2600 is a homebrew action game with gameplay similar to The Legend of Zelda and the sequel to the 2008 Game Boy Advance game Anguna.

The story is similar to the first game, but this time the hero is on a quest to defeat the Goblin King. As in the original Anguna, the protagonist got captured early on and must escape his prison and explore 5 dungeons to defeat the villain.
title: Anguna 2600
